name: content
trans: the subject or ideas contained in something written, said, created, or represented

name: taste
trans: Taste is also a person’s liking for or appreciation of something

name: supervision
trans: overseeing; keeping an eye on something or someone

name: acquire
trans: gain knowledge or skills

name: ongoing
trans: continuing to exist, happen, or develop

name: survey
trans: a set of questions people are asked to gather information or find out their opinions, or the information gathered by asking many people the same questions

name: endeavor
trans: an effort or attempt to do something

name: sponsor
trans: to support a person, organization, or activity by giving money, encouragement, or other help

name: hone
trans: to direct something such as an ability to make it more effective

name: breeze
trans: a light wind

name: colorful
trans: having a lot of variety and therefore interesting

name: cuisine
trans: a style of cooking

name: ingredient
trans: one of the parts in a mixture

name: enroll
trans: to put yourself or someone else on an official list for an activity or for membership in a group, or to accept someone in such a list

name: residential
trans: of or relating to houses where people live rather than to places where they work

name: economical
trans: not using a lot of money, energy, etc.

name: resort
trans: a place where people can go on vacations to relax or for an activity they enjoy

name: costly
trans: expensive

name: broad
trans: very wide

name: budget
trans: a financial plan that lists expected expenses and income during a particular period
